verses.name: Amos 7:4
verses.text: Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me: and, behold, the Lord God called to contend by fire, and it devoured the great deep, and did eat up a part.

verses.name: Amos 7:5
verses.text: Then said I, O Lord God, cease, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small.

verses.name: Amos 7:6
verses.text: The Lord repented for this: This also shall not be, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Amos 7:7
verses.text: Thus he shewed me: and, behold, the Lord stood upon a wall made by a plumbline, with a plumbline in his hand.
